Content.summary: 'Thanh Binh four chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, GBP, Hospitality Recreation written on 12 September 2006
Content.tags: London, Hospitality Recreation, Vietnamese, Bun Bo Hue
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 10/09/2006

Four chilli rated

http://www.london-eating.co.uk/3257.htm
14 Chalk Farm Road, London, NW1 8AG

Nice cafe style place in Camden. Suprisignly quiet despite the mayhem of the market outside. They only had Pho (no hue style), though the chilli sauce soon resolved that.

Good for: Very tasty stock and fresh herbs.
Bad for: Parking - we got a Â£50 on a sunday (always read the signs).
